name: Mike el palo travieso
description:
Click on Full-Screen in order to see everything.

A "golf simulation game" made by my friends and me just for fun.

Controls:

AD -> Rotate.

Space -> Shoot.

12345 -> Select different balls.

1 -> Normal one.

2-> Birds killer.

3-> Explosion ball (destroy everything inside a radio).

4 -> Fantasy ball (Spawn unicorns and gives you score while flying. When the arrows appears: click on down arrow and space to stay in the old position or click up arrov and space to stay in the new position).

5 -> Multiple ball.

Goal: 

Reach the light column as much levels as you can before you loose all your score.
